table.name: Venkarthim, The Doom Of Ants
table.entry:
Following an acidic smell into an alleyway leads you to a small shrine to Venkarthim, an anteater god from the distant Mooncradle Mountains. On a plate in the statue anteater's lap is a pile of offered ant corpses.
"The Urth quakes as He proceeds, blue dust rising in a regal plume that shades His passage. Holy holy holy! Holy is Venkarthim, Doom of Ants, sacred beast of the eastern mountains! Holy holy holy! Holy is Venkarthim, the raider of the deepest nests, whose divine tongue is two-score cubits in length!"
